```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}

for (i in 1:length(params$field1.i)) {
  
  cat("
  \\pagenumbering{gobble}
  \\definecolor{mycolor}{HTML}{",params$bgcolor,"}
  \\definecolor{mycolortext}{HTML}{",params$textcolor,"}
  \\begin{mdframed}[linecolor=mycolortext, linewidth=2pt, backgroundcolor=mycolor]\n
  \\bigskip
  \\bigskip
  \\begin{flushright}
  \\begin{minipage}[b][0ex][t]{16em}",
  if(!is.null(qr)) "\\qrcode[height=2in, version=5]{",
  if(!is.null(qr)) params$qr.i[i],
  if(!is.null(qr)) "}",
  "
  \\end{minipage}
  \\end{flushright}
  \\begin{adjustwidth}{1cm}{1cm}
  {\\fontsize{35pt}{100pt}\\emph{\\selectfont\\textcolor{mycolortext}{",
  params$field1.i[i],
  "}} \\\\
  \\linebreak
  \\linebreak
  {\\fontsize{40pt}{0pt}\\selectfont\\bf\\textcolor{mycolortext}{", 
  params$field2.i[i],
  "}}} \\\\
  \\vfill
  {\\fontsize{30pt}{100pt}\\selectfont\\textcolor{mycolortext}{", 
  params$field3.i[i],
  "}} \\\\
  \\vfill
  {\\fontsize{30pt}{100pt}\\selectfont\\textcolor{mycolortext}{",
  params$field4.i[i],
  "}} \\\\
  \\vfill
  {\\fontsize{30pt}{50pt}\\selectfont\\textcolor{mycolortext}{",
  params$field5.i[i],
  "}} \\\\
  \\end{adjustwidth}
  \\begin{center}
  \\includegraphics[height=1.5in]{logo.png}
  \\end{center}
  \\end{mdframed}
  \\pagebreak
  ")
}
```
